text: læa meux phwk khea diyin sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ rx sul læw cea k ca hen ta khxng phwk khea hlang xxk ma sung nata neuxngcak khwam cring thi phwk khea ru doythi phwk khea ca klaw wa xo phracea khxng phwk kha phraxngkh pord di thrng caruk phwk kha phraxngkh wi rwm kab brrda phu klaw ptiyan yunyan dwy theid
